rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Spacious and wheelchair accessible entrance with a ramp and wide doorway. Features a reception area and coat closet.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living space with colonial design elements; ample natural light through large French windows facing the front. Includes seating area and entertainment zone.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room for colonial elegance; includes a dining table and space for formal gatherings.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern yet colonial styled kitchen with accessible design; features lower countertops and an open layout. Includes wheelchair-accessible workstations.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Largest bedroom with colonial decor; includes en-suite bathroom designed for accessibility. Features ample closet space and a private balcony.

rooms.name: En-suite Bathroom
rooms.description: Wheelchair accessible bathroom with grab bars, roll-in shower and safety features. Colonial design elements integrated.

rooms.name: Servant's Quarters
rooms.description: Private space for domestic help; includes a compact bedroom and small kitchenette; designed with simplicity in mind. Adaptable features for wheelchair access.

rooms.name: Swimming Pool Area
rooms.description: Outdoor area hosting a swimming pool with colonial landscaping. Includes deck space and seating areas. Designed for wheelchair access with ramps.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Wheelchair accessible main entrance with a ramp and wide door. Vastu principles align this entrance in the east-west direction.

openings.name: Balcony Access
openings.description: Balconies overlooking the living area and swimming pool, designed to offer privacy and natural ventilation according to Vastu guidelines.

openings.name: Service Entrance
openings.description: Dedicated service entrance for servant's quarters with a ramp for wheelchair accessibility.

notes: Design incorporates colonial aesthetic, ensures wheelchair accessibility throughout, and respects local building norms and Vastu principles for energy flow.
